body_html:
Oh, you must be using an old version of Bazel? liblibtensorflow.so.ifso is the import library you want.

Do I need to use the old version of bazel and compile the tensorflow or rename the liblibtensorflow.so.ifso to libtensorflow.so.if.lib and use Visual Studio 2015 to import it?
body_text:
Oh, you must be using an old version of Bazel? liblibtensorflow.so.ifso is the import library you want.

Do I need to use the old version of bazel and compile the tensorflow or  rename the liblibtensorflow.so.ifso to libtensorflow.so.if.lib and use Visual Studio 2015 to import it?
body:
> Oh, you must be using an old version of Bazel? `liblibtensorflow.so.ifso` is the import library you want.

Do I need to use the old version of bazel and compile the tensorflow or  rename the liblibtensorflow.so.ifso to libtensorflow.so.if.lib and use Visual Studio 2015 to import it?
